Package org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.model.api

Interface DataSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CsvFileDataSource, FileDataSource, InMemoryDataSource, RdfFileDataSource, SparqlQueryResultDataSource, VLogDataSource
    public interface DataSource
extends Entity
    Interfaces various types of data sources for storing facts.
    Author:
    Irina Dragoste

      • toConfigString

        String toConfigString()
        Constructs a String representation of the data source.
        Returns:
        a String representation of the data source configuration for a certain predicate.

      • getRequiredArity

        default Optional<Integer> getRequiredArity()
        Retrieve the required arity of target predicates for the data source.
        Returns:
        the required arity for the data source, or Optional.empty() if there is none.
